rle_commands.command: 🚗 Rule Reminder: We drive via map layout! (right handside)
🚨Rule Reminder: When an emergency vehicle is driving past, please pull over to let them through to respond to their emergency call!
⚠️Rule Reminder: You are not allowed any authorised firearms on the police team unless trained!
🚙Rule Reminder: Please de-sync any crashes below 30mph or any glitches that may occur due to roblox!
🛣️Rule Reminder: Do not leave your vehicle unattended in the middle of the road unless it's for roleplay purposes!
💥Rule Reminder: You must have gun permissions to use any authorised firearms on the civilian team!
🔦 Rule Reminder: Unless in a police chase, we recommend you follow traffic laws to create a sense of realism!

adv_hints.command: ⭐Welcome to Birmingham Roleplay. We hope you enjoy your roleplay!
📌Start your roleplaying journey with Birmingham Roleplay! Communications Code: UKBRUM
📫Need assistance? Do not hesitate to call !mod or !help for staff attention. Communications Code: UKBRUM
✈️ Here at Birmingham Roleplay we catch flights not feelings. Join up today to have an incredible roleplaying experience. Communications Code: UKBRUM
🤯Want to be mindblowed with an incredible experience? Come on down and join our community today! Communications Code: UKBRUM
🚨Take your roleplay a step forward with Birmimgham Roleplay, and apply to join our whitelisted team! Communications Code: UKBRUM
💫 Actual Roleplay? Dedicated Team? Well you're at the right place, join us today and start an experience you will never forget! Communications Code: UKBRUM

adv_messages.command: 🔥Kick start your roleplay with Birmingham Roleplay, an experience you'll never forget. Communications Code: UKBRUM
🍉We are always open for your feedback! Communications Code: UKBRUM
🤯 Spotted somebody violating our rules? Alert our staff team today by grabbing their attention (!mod or !help)
⭐Come on down and join our community! Communications Code: UKBRUM
✈️ Here at Birmingham Roleplay we catch flights not feelings. Join up today to have an incredible roleplaying experience. Communications Code: UKBRUM
🚨Start your policing career with West Midlands Police Service! Communications Code: UKBRUM
